sourcesContent:
import React, {Fragment, useState } from "react"; import InputRange from "react-input-range"; import Breadcrumb from "../common/breadcrumb"; import { Container, Row, Col, Card, CardHeader, CardBody, Label, Form, } from "reactstrap"; import {Default,BasicSlider,NegativeValues,FormatedLabel,DraggableRange,Disabled} from '../../constant' const RangeSlider = () => { const initialslider = { value: 10, nagative: -10, foramtedLabel: 10, disabled: 10, foramtedLabelKg: 5, draggable: { min: 3, max: 7, }, }; const [values, setValues] = useState(initialslider); return (
{BasicSlider}
setValues({ ...values, value: value }) } />
{NegativeValues}
setValues({ ...values, nagative: value }) } />
{Disabled}
setValues({ ...values, disabled: value }) } />
{FormatedLabel}
values.foramtedLabel.toFixed(2)} value={values.foramtedLabel} onChange={(value) => setValues({ ...values, foramtedLabel: value }) } />
{FormatedLabel}
`${values.foramtedLabelKg} kg`} value={values.foramtedLabelKg} onChange={(value) => setValues({ ...values, foramtedLabelKg: value }) } />
{DraggableRange}
setValues({ ...values, draggable: value }) } />
); }; export default RangeSlider;
